entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:51 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:51 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
